t: Amazon Purchase with Preferred Suppliers – Business Accounts - Amazon Customer Service
s: Learn about Preferred Suppliers in Amazon Business, how to manage them, and how they impact purchasing for your organization. Learn how to manage and utilize this feature.
The Preferred Supplier feature allows administrators to direct more of their organisation's purchases to a specific seller.
It sounds like you are asking for a list suppliers/distributors who sell products that are pre-approved for sale on Amazon, either by Amazon and/or brand owners, yes?

t: Set Amazon Products as Preferred for Buying - Business Accounts - Amazon Customer Service
s: To remove a brand, select the Actions link next to the brand in the brands list, and then select Remove. Note: You can view all your preferred items by selecting the preferred items tab in Buying policies & Approvals.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: Set Amazon Sellers as Preferred for Buying - Business Accounts - Amazon Customer Service
s: Efficiently choose your go-to sellers on Amazon Business using Guided Buying. Business Prime users can set preferred sellers, ensure Section 889 compliance, or prioritize small and diverse sellers.

t: Guide buyers to purchase items from certain preferred brands | Amazon Business
s: Administrators can now mark preferred brands so that items from these brands will appear first in search results

t: Set Amazon sellers as preferred for buying – Business accounts - Amazon Customer Service
s: Efficiently choose your go-to sellers on Amazon Business using Guided Buying. Business Prime users can set preferred sellers, ensure Section 889 compliance or prioritise small and diverse sellers.

Your company’s administrators can access Guided Buying via the Business Settings page. Within the Guided Buying landing page, Administrators can identify certain products and suppliers as preferred. These products will be badged as Preferred in the buying experience that your employees see.
